title: 137 - Good Luke Hunting
description:
The Gang breaks out the family tree to figure out who’s going bald and who’s keeping the flow. Livy punches Luke to relieve stress and breaks out a guitar to share her latest track. Luke fixes the sink and introduces the gang to Pindar, the world dominating lizard…who calls in later! Heather shares unfortunate stories involving tobacco spit. Tim analyzes fame and shares his secret of “outermittent” fasting: eating for 22 hours a day and fasting for 2 (Please don’t try this at home).    Big thanks to our sponsors for this episode:    Goodr: Get 15% off your entire order at goodr.com when you use code TIM at checkout!    Public Goods:  Go to www.publicgoods.com/HAWKINS or use code HAWKINS at checkout to receive $15 off your first order with no minimum purchase!   Faithful Counseling: Go to  https://faithfulcounseling.com/timhawkins for 10% off of your first month of counseling!  
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
